<<<<<<< HEAD

=======
```sh
$ npm install --save is-path-in-cwd
>>>>>>> 99ef3b4711c8dcd2f717e43dd012712d1f333361
```


## Usage

```js
<<<<<<< HEAD
const isPathInCwd = require('is-path-in-cwd');
=======
var isPathInCwd = require('is-path-in-cwd');
>>>>>>> 99ef3b4711c8dcd2f717e43dd012712d1f333361

isPathInCwd('unicorn');
//=> true

isPathInCwd('../rainbow');
//=> false

isPathInCwd('.');
//=> false
```
